text: I apologize but i have to miss class tonight. promise this won't become a habit. I have some ideas for more features for the app. feel free to use them if you want. 1) invite friends from some form of contacts (facebook, insta etc ) to play, 2)create quiz groups for team experience, 3)change skill level of quizzes 4) choose from different quiz formats (fill in blank, multiple choice, etc) 5)unlock new features in rapid fire bonus rounds where you compete against the clock.
